title: The Week of Valor: The Story of Alice Cooper
summary: This story follows Alice Cooper, a 30-year-old superhero, whose hobbies are helping people and worshiping, as she faces challenges over a week but triumphs over a major threat to her city.
summaryGerman: Diese Geschichte folgt Alice Cooper, einer 30-jährigen Superheldin, deren Hobbys Menschen helfen und Anbetung sind, während sie im Laufe einer Woche Herausforderungen begegnet, aber eine große Bedrohung für ihre Stadt überwindet.
summaryDutch: Dit verhaal volgt Alice Cooper, een 30-jarige superheldin, wiens hobby's mensen helpen en aanbidden zijn, terwijl ze gedurende een week uitdagingen het hoofd biedt maar triomfeert over een grote bedreiging voor haar stad.
summaryFrench: Cette histoire suit Alice Cooper, une super-héroïne de 30 ans, dont les passe-temps sont aider les gens et adorer, alors qu'elle fait face à des défis pendant une semaine mais triomphe d'une grande menace pour sa ville.

story.text: Alice Cooper starts her week helping at a local shelter and spreading cheer among the homeless. Her compassionate actions bring smiles to many faces.
Alice senses a mysterious, eerie energy pulsing beneath the city. She dedicates her day to investigate, finding clues and piecing together a potential threat.
The threat becomes clearer: an ancient evil trying to resurface. Alice spends the day rallying her community for support and preparing for battle.
An epic showdown takes place between Alice and the emerging evil force. She displays incredible courage and strength, protecting her beloved city.
After a victorious battle, Alice helps to repair the city and restore peace. Her heroic efforts are celebrated by all those she has saved.
Alice spends a peaceful day recovering and worshiping, reflecting on the week's events and giving thanks for her strength and the support of her community.
Rejuvenated, Alice continues her regular activities of helping and worshiping, ready for whatever new challenges may come her way.

ending: And so, Alice Cooper proved once again that with courage and unity, any darkness can be overcome.
moral: Unity and courage are our greatest weapons against adversity.
